output:
The moonless sea, the waves crushing beneath the black sky full of lights
This gloomy landscape is the dark picture of your nights
A cold wind freezing your thoughts lets you motionless
I came once upon a time with a midnight clock like those
that chime to wake you up from this battle you fought and to bring you back to life
Mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm
Mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm
Mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm
But you didn't want to follow me, you ran away from me
Though I tried for days and days to drive the sea
You stayed locked up in your mom though I tried to turn up the moon
Tonight I'll write a song for you to maybe reach your deeply buried heart
I wanna stay with you for eternity listening to the silence of our souls
